title: The Tin soldier. The Nightingale
creator_credit: Atkinson Film Arts, Crawleys Animation, Shanghai Animation Films, W. H. Stevens, Wang Bairong, Richard Morrison and Chris Schouten
brief_description: Two delightful animated children’s stories from the classic Hans Christian Anderson fairy tales, narrated by Christopher Plummer. “The Tin Soldier” is about friendship and love between a music box ballerina and a tin toy soldier. “The Nightingale” is an enchanting tale set in the mystical land of ancient China.
